attributes.action: immediately sack Nick Starmer for the political apparatchik that he is.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As DPP this man is supposed to be neutral, representing the interests of the people AGAINST those wishing to damage them, including anything the government does which threatens the state of democracy in this country.  By criticising, or supporting, the spoutings of any of our politicians OF ANY COLOUR, he has demonstrated that he is NOT impartial and is, in fact, a McBroon crony plant committed to the downfall of democracy in this country.  HE MUST GO AND HE MUST GO NOW.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
